introduction: SYNOPSISMin-ji jumps into the den of evil after her sister, Su-ji, is killed by gangsters. Falling into the trap of Dal-ho's men, Min-ji ends up working in the red district. It is a place where inhuman exploitation and unlawfulness have complete control and terrible happenings are constant. Min-ji's boyfriend, Jun-yob, looks for her in the red district but backs off due to the violence of Dal-ho's men. Filled with hate, Min-ji seduces Dal-ho and then kills him. With Sun-im, the new girl, Min-ji escapes the brothel. Jun-yob sweeps the brothel with the police. Min-ji feels a sisterhood with Sun-im, something she hadn't felt for a long time. Min-ji goes to a mass with Sun-im. Jun-yob stands beside them.故事当Min yu的妹妹苏珊被流氓杀害时，她跳进邪恶的巢穴，陷入了达洛的陷阱，成为妓女。有不人道的剥削和勒索，有各种可怕的事件。民族的恋人Jun-yeop的夜生活和娱乐区，他搜查了Min-ji，但他退缩了Dalho-dang党的暴力。闵行充满仇恨，逃离了新根除的皮条客屋，诱惑和杀害了达豪。Joon - yop清除警察和皮条客。与姐妹和群众建立关系已经很久了，旁边还有一个大三学生。
